column5: Looks promising, but im confused looking at the pic. couls somebody tell me which way is Nord? Im assuming North is at the top, but I cant tell from the pic.
North is toward the top,and the middle of the lake is still open.Pretty much the perimiter and south end are locked up. Won't be long now!!
4mm of rain in the forecast for Friday, lol.  Great timing.
I bet she skims over tonight. That rain friday will be a blessing!  S.
Melt any of the snow on the surface, lock it back up tight might be fishing before New Years
I saw about a dozen guys fishing out from Gilford today. No idea how thick the ice is though

Thanks for sharing I watch the site everyday and it's amazing about the progession of the ice and snow and same for spring when it starts going out !!!!! Lots of the smaller lakes are very safe now guys are fishing all of the Kawartha lakes and have been for 2 weeks lots of sleds out as well !!!  Just be careful and use common sense !!!!! Like the old saying goes "if you don't know,don't go" that simple !!!!!! Tight-lines
Thanx for keeping us informed.  It does look promising for Jan.1.  Woo Hoo!
I saw a report on another board and the guy drilled a hole and there was 4" of ice at the end of Gilford road. Anyone know how the ice is at Virginia Beach?
I'm looking out the end of bbp and its ice as far as the eye can see.  Not much snow , let's hope it makes it through the warm spell and continues to thicken till jan 1
